actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes a customs or immigration inspector under provisions of Federal law governing: (1) the minimum and maximum age of appointment; (2) payroll deductions and agency contributions to the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund; (3) mandatory retirement; and (4) the eligibility requirements for immediate retirement of Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters. Specifies the amounts which an inspector may deposit into the Fund for periods of service for which no deposits or deductions were made.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors, and for other purposes.
